mockTestScenarios.name: Basic Conversation Flow
mockTestScenarios.description: Tests the agent's ability to maintain a coherent conversation with basic queries.

mockTestScenarios.name: Complex Problem Solving
mockTestScenarios.description: Evaluates the agent's capability to solve complex problems requiring multi-step reasoning.

mockTestScenarios.name: API Integration Test
mockTestScenarios.description: Tests the agent's ability to interact with external APIs and process the returned data correctly.

mockTestScenarios.name: Code Review Accuracy
mockTestScenarios.description: Evaluates how accurately the agent can identify bugs and suggest improvements in code samples.

mockTestScenarios.name: Content Moderation
mockTestScenarios.description: Tests the agent's ability to identify and handle inappropriate content according to guidelines.

mockTestScenarios.name: Multi-turn Conversation
mockTestScenarios.description: Tests the agent's ability to maintain context across multiple conversation turns.
